attributes.action: Stop foreign aid, except where it is most needed, for 5 years.
attributes.background: Petition speaks for itself, everyone knows and is fed up with the way our money always seems to be diverted by  corrupt leaders and businessmen for personal use and not all of it seems to get to the people who need it. Get our country sorted first.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure what kinds of foreign aid you would like to continue. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
